code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import{showAlert}from"../utils/utils";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var QRCodeImage=function QRCodeImage(_ref){var data=_ref.data;var qrCodeRef=useRef(null);var handleCopyClick=function handleCopyClick(){if(qrCodeRef.current){var canvas=document.createElement('canvas');var context=canvas.getContext('2d');var image=qrCodeRef.current;if(context){canvas.width=image.width;canvas.height=image.height;context.drawImage(image,0,0);canvas.toBlob(function(blob){if(blob){var item=new ClipboardItem({'image/png':blob});navigator.clipboard.write([item]);showAlert({msg:"QRcode copied",type:"success"});}});}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{ref:qrCodeRef,src:data,alt:"QR Code",className:"w-48 h-48 mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCopyClick,className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Copy QR Code"})]});};export default QRCodeImage;
